quests.name: Getting Green
quests.description: To get your witch on, one of the first things you should do is get all of the Witchery plants. These you will need for all of those lotions and potions you will be making.

tasks.longDescription: Punch Grass and get the seeds simple enough.
Grow those seed you just got you will need a few.

quests.name: Bubble, bubble
quests.description: Now that you have the seeds and plants you can craft yourself some anointing paste. Use that on a cauldron and you will get your very own witches cauldron.

tasks.longDescription: Craft this paste

The regular Minecraft cauldron not witchy enough. Well with the anointing paste you just made. Right click it on your regular Minecraft cauldron to spice it up. You will need it pick it into your inventory to get credit for this one.

quests.name: Fumes
quests.description: Able to capture the by-products produced in the cooking process, the witches oven is esential in your witching career.

quests.name: Mutate all the things
quests.description: Mutandis is a mutagen that is used by witches and warlocks to mutate plants into other species.

tasks.longDescription: Craft this magical stuff in your witches cauldron
Simply use Mutandis on small plants, grass, flowers, saplings, etc. and it will be randomly converted to another plant. Mutating plants is the only way to acquire Rowan, Hawthorn and Alder saplings.
These are the fumes that you could not get before. Now with these now saplings at your disposal you can get those.
With the mutandis you should probably grab those other plants that popped up in the process.
It is little known that mutandis can also be used on meat to mutate it to the other kinds of meat. It even works on rotten flesh. This is a crafting quest so no killing to complete this quest.

quests.name: Altar POWA
quests.description: The altar when placed with nature around (Sapling, grass, crops, trees, etc.)

tasks.longDescription: The Altar is what will power your future circle magic. It generates power from nature.

These items pretty important. By placing these items on the altar, you can improve aspects of your altar like charge rate and base energy. The Arthana Extends the altar reach and can be used to get special drop if used to kill a mob
A skull placed on the altar is one of the most powerful objects to be placed on it. Diffent skulls are more effective then others but an altar can only have one head on it.

quests.name: Distilling
quests.description: Witchery requires you to distill vapors into new vapors and other magical components. This requires an altar near by and will use a little of its power to run.

tasks.longDescription: These fumes are made from other fumes distilled in your new distillery. See how that works.

quests.name: "It's like a circle"
quests.description: The next thing we can do to make use some of that altar power is circle magic.

tasks.longDescription: Circle magic is conducted by drawing circles in chalk on the ground. Circle can be different sizes and come in different variety. Different magics will require different combinations. The circle magic book will left you know the specifics.

quests.name: Black Cats
quests.description: Hopefully you played around with the fun stuff that circle magic has to offer. Well to progress further you are going to need a familiar bound to you. There are quite a few options for familiars however, to gain witches in you coven and to cast certain curses you will need a cat as one. The others you can presue as sides quest to this one.

tasks.longDescription: Well I can't make sure you bind your cat but distill that heart and get binding, you won't be able to do some rituals without it.
Wait cats DON'T like drinking blood? They prefer milk, hm? Well then make purified milk too then. You did this to yourself.

quests.name: More mutation
quests.description: Mutandis is really cool but it can't mutate everything. So making it a little more extreme is a good idea. Mutandis Extremis can mutate multi-stage plant like cactus. It can also mutate cooked meat.

tasks.longDescription: This mutandis can mutate more plants can be used to craft a very useful tool. The mutating sprig.
Mutandis Extremis can be used to mutate cooked meat who knew.

quests.name: Cauldron Tips
quests.description: Not a quest per say but some much useful knowledge. The cauldron crafts some pretty cool stuff however you should know that some recipes use altar power and some use more power then others. That being said you can find in your book you crafted when you crafted anointing paste, that chalk can be used to lower cost of a recipe in the cauldron and can also lower chance to get some bad effects from the cauldron when crafting in it.

quests.name: Demon Slayer
quests.description: This may seem daunting but you are going to have to fight a demon. You need his heart. I hope you have tried out some circle magic on your own. You can use more then one ritual at once and they will activate in order of how they show up in the book. So a containment ritual and summoning ritual for the demon can be used in conjuction if need be.

tasks.longDescription: Incase the icon doesn't show thats the demon your killing.
Demon hearts can be distilled, used in crafting, or even placed on your altar for even more power.

quests.name: Coven
quests.description: Its time to create a coven. You must speak with Witchery witches. In order for them to speak with you one of 2 things must happen. Either preform an infussion on yourself or have a cat familiar. Having 6 witches fills a coven. As a note there is a circle magic ritual to summon a coven witch if you are having trouble finding some

tasks.longDescription: The quartz sphere is a component for multiple items. The one you can use with your new witches is the seer stone.
The Seer Stone is an essential object to use your new coven. Using this to activate your circle ritual with call your witches to help out in the magic.

quests.name: Infusing
quests.description: Infusing gives you super natural powers.

tasks.longDescription: One of these can be used to infuse a player with magical properties. Depending on which you choose you will have access to different abilities and draw different spells with your wand.... i mean mystic branch
With this you can cast spells like a real witch/warlock. consult the symbology book for spells.

quests.name: Sprig power
quests.description: The mutating sprig can be used to mutate multiple object in the world into one new object. Ill try to talk you through the Items and blocks you can make through this.

tasks.longDescription: This block is created by first diging a 3x3 cross in the ground. Now dig one block deeper in each of the 4 ends of the cross. Fill those 4 new 1x1 holes with water. Place a trapped chest in the center of the water(will be one block above the water. Now across from the 4 walls of the chest place 1 vine. Hit the chest with the mutating sprig and you have the leech chest. This block will store blood samples from the last 3 players to open it. These samples can be removed with a taglock kit.

For this one make the same cross dug into the ground. Dig one block deeper into the center of the cross. Fill that 1x1 with water. Place a leach chest above the water. Place 4 poppies next to the chest and activate with the mutating sprig. These poppies will store the blood of one player that walks over it. Blood can be removed with taglock. Flower must be broken with boline or it will be destroyed.

Create this the same way you created the blood poppies but instead of a leech chest use a regular chest and instead of poppies use short grass. Grassper can have items place in them to hold them for circle magic or other mutations with the mutating sprig.

This is made similar to the Grassper and blood poppies. Difference is where the leech chest/chest was you place a cobweb with a zombie trapped in it and where the poppies/short grass was you place alder sapplings. Use the mutating spring on the cobweb and you are set. These Plants can catch small creatures like Silverfish, bats, and small slimes.

To get these dig a 3x3 hole. Within this hole dig a 3x3 cross. fill this with watter. Then place dirt back in the center of that. In the 4 corners of the 3x3 place a grassper plant with an ender pearl in it. Then between those grasspers place a Spanish moss.(4 total). Then place sugarcane in the very middle. You can slack up to 16 high. Click the lowest most sugarcane with your mutating sprig and your done. Anything that walks into ender Bramble will be teleported randomly within 500 blocks away.

Wild bramble is very similar to craft as ender bramble. Main difference it replace the sugarcane on dirt with cactus on sand(up to 4 high). Also in the grasspers instead of ender pearls place 2 bonemeal and 2 blaze powered. Wild bramble damages any creature or item that passes through them. Breaking them will cause them to spread and the only way to avoid that is to break with a gold axe.

quests.name: Mutating mobs
quests.description: The sprig can be used to mutate living creatures to get new familiars to bind to yourself. Familiars like cats giving you different benifits can allow different circle magic to be preformed.

tasks.longDescription: Toads can be created from an ocelot or cat. Dig a 3x3 into the ground. Dig one block more down in the center. Place water in that 1x1 hole and put a cobweb above that with the cat trapped in it. In the 4 corners place grasspers (3 with mutandis extremis 1 with a charged attuned stone). Place 4 critter snares with small slimes trapped between the grasspers.
Owls are created much like Toads/ They are mutated from Wolves or dogs. Changes from the toad are instead of critter snares with small slimes use ones with bats in them.

The parasytic louse is an interesting on. Its set up is much like that of the ender bramble. Dig a 3x3 hole into the ground. Then dig a cross in that and fill the cross with water. Place a block back in the center of that cross. Four corners get grasspers 2 with mutandis 1 with tongue of dog and one with charged attuned stone. over the water goes lily pads. and in the center goes the critter snare with a silverfish in it.

quests.name: AROOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!
quests.description: Believe it or not, you know enough to become a wolf/werewolf

tasks.longDescription: These are the stuff you will need to get together to become a werewolf. Also have your circle magic book on you as there are special requirement involved such as altar power, full moon, and your seer stone to have your witches help out..

quests.name: Toil and trouble
quests.description: The kettle is a fundamental part of being a witch. It is where you will make brews and oils.

tasks.longDescription: In addition to crafting the kettle im making you craft witches' hat and robes. These will give you a chance to make extra brews. You will need a spining wheel for each piece but ill mention more about it later just use NEI and craft it ill ask you to have it later.
One of the first thing you should craft in the kettle is redstone soup. You can use it to fill your chalice you have on the altar and make it even better.

quests.name: I vant to suck your blood
quests.description: For those brave enough and who can stomach the horror, you can become a vampire. This quest requires no others however as it is difficult gameplay wise i suggest you get geared up in one way or another. I also recommed you progress in witchery at least a little.

tasks.longDescription: Your going to need this book to figure out how to become a vampire. This i a detection quest because you don't HAVE to craft it. It can be found in some villages.
This version of the book is made by crafting your observations of the immortal with a torn page. This can be gotten from monsters or from the same place you can find the book.

quests.name: The unholy deed
quests.description: Now its time to do the deed. You will need to kill a chicken over the ritual you will set up.
prerequisites: I vant to suck your blood

tasks.longDescription: Boline to kill and a goblet to catch the blood
All the items need to set up the ritual area follow the diagram in the observations of an immortal book.
Kill the chicken over the skull with the boline. Have the goblet in your hot bar. It can be any time of day. Now you need to pour the goblet on the skull however it needs to be night to do that part.

quests.name: Do as you are told
quests.description: Now with your follower in tow, listen to you new masters instructions

tasks.longDescription: Enter the nether with your new follower
lead her into lava and wait. She will turn into lillith. Now kill her.

When the lillith is killed she you are worthy and now have two options. Magic or death. For magic she ask that you give her an item to enchant. This can be done multiple times and is usually a max enchant and really good. Death option you give her your glass goblet and she will fill it with her blood. Drink it and you are now a vampire.

quests.name: Your first kill
quests.description: In the observations of the immortal once you add the torn page you will learn each think you have to do to lvl up your powers. Each paragraph is a new lvl. Read that if you want because i am about to spoil it for you.

tasks.longDescription: You will gain a level by getting your new blood bar ont the left o the screen full. You can access this power by pressing 1 to cycle through vampire powers to the left of hotbar. You gain the transfix ability after completing this task.

quests.name: Frozen at the sight of you
quests.description: Your Next lvl is gained by draining half of a villager/players blood while they are under your transfix ability. Rememer to cycle powers using 1 key. Once you complete this all your attacks will get extra knockback.

quests.name: Four nights of thirst
quests.description: Now you must drink blood from villagers for 4 nights. This new lvl you gain gives you a speed effect you can now activate at the cost of blood.
prerequisites: Frozen at the sight of you

quests.name: Your blood will boil
quests.description: For this quest you are going to take some damage so if you have not already craft vampire gear. There is men and women versions so i won't make it required to finish this quest. Once you finish this task your new vampire lvl will allow you to not die instantly in sun.

tasks.longDescription: In order to get blood-stained wool, with blood in your blood pool click wool with a bone needle
The cane sword is a really neat vampire tool. Kills made with it will be stored in its internal resevoir. While it is sheathed you can use its blood to fill your own blood pool.

The way to become a lvl 5 vampire is to make sun grenades and get hit by to of them. Sun grenades are created by placing a quartz sphere in a sun collector. The sun collector needs to be near a daylight sensor. I only required you have one of each however you could be more effecient by placing more then one sun collector near a daylight sensor.

quests.name: Men of pure fire
quests.description: For this lvl you must kill 20 blazes. Afther this your new vampire lvl will allow toy to break stone instantly whn sneak clicking with an empty hand.

tasks.description: Death to the men of fire
tasks.longDescription: Kill 20 blazes

quests.name: Back to where it all began
quests.description: Now you must visit lillith again. This time to request your freedom. One you do this you gain bat swarm ability, transform into a swarm or bad and get creative flight.

tasks.longDescription: Repeat the same ritual as before and kill lillith again. This time give lillith her favorite flower.

quests.name: Explore your new domain
quests.description: To become a lvl 8 vampire you must fly from one village to another. A sound will chime once a village has been recognized as visited. With this level up Mesmerized villagers will now follow you.
prerequisites: Back to where it all began

quests.name: Put them in cages
quests.description: To become a vampire of lvl 9 you must trap 5 villagers in cages as shown in your observations on an immortal book. Then you must mesemerize and drink each ones blood to half. You must not damage them by going over half. At your new level you will be able to create vampires with your blood.

quests.name: Make them one of us
quests.description: Your final vampire lvl is given once you turn a villager into a vampire. To do this you must have a villager near a coffin. Drain the villagers blood all the way. To prevent killing the villager you can use regen potion on them.(their blood is not tied to their health).Now with their blood drained fill a glass goblet with your blood  mesmerize him and give him your blood to drink. Now you have completely leveled up and have blood power explained in the next quest.

quests.name: Wolf Level up
quests.description: You shall now learn how to control your power and become even more powerful.

tasks.longDescription: Craft this altar and please the gods you shall be rewarded. Curently you are a wolve at night and a man during the day.

The gods asked for gold. Once you have done with for the gods you can get another moon charm the same way you got the first. THe do have durability. With this charm you can prevent forced form change and use the charm to change to wolf/human form at will.

Killing sheep in Wolf or Wolfman Form can result in Raw Lambchops being dropped. Curently you don't have access to the wolfman form. the next tasks the gods ask are you to kill 30 of the weakest pray can bring their meat. Completing this gives you the ability to dig earth your you bare claws while a wolf. Sometimes you will find bones.

The gods now ask that you prove you are an alpha. You must kill wolves/hellhounds and get their tongues. Appon completing this kills from Wolf or Wolfman form will now be eaten, replenishing hunger loss
You have spoke to the gods ones more and they have given you a horn. Call the huntsman forth and slay him they say.
You have called him now kill him. Once complete speak to the gods and they will grant you new form. You can now additionally transform to Wolfman Form using a Moon Charm (while sneaking).

You must now kill 10 things in wolf/wolfman form with crits. After talking to the gods once act is complete they will let you know that hitting while sprinting in Wolf of Wolfman form will now cause additional damage (basically a crit)
Let your voices be heard. Howl in 16 locations. Afting doing this Wolfman Form gains the ability to sneak use (shift right-click) while looking straight up to howl and stun nearby creatures

Now they ask that you bend weaker wolves to your will. While in wolf form right click wild wolves to tame them. Once complete you gain a new ability, Wolf Form gains the ability to sneak use (shift right-click) while looking straight up to howl to summon temporary wolf allies.
Now to the nether. Kill 30 pigmen as wolfman. Gods sharpen your claws and now Wolfman Form gains the ability to rend armor.

Now you must kill a villager or player with wolfman form. I require a villager. Once this act is complete your training is done. The gods gift you will the ability to spread your curse of the wolf to villagers or players it is spread by attacking in wolfman form and nearly killing.

quests.name: Your minions
quests.description: Now that you are the master of a vampire coven you can have your minions collect a little blood for you.

tasks.longDescription: Place this by the coffin where your vampire minions were made and sleep. Your minions will place some of their blood they got from villagers into the crucible.

These Items can be placed into a full blood crucible. Each has a different effect. A bone gives you the teleport ability. When activated away from their spawn point, will teleport the vampire to their spawn. When activated near their spawn point, will teleport the vampire to the closest village. The water artichoke will allow you to summon a storm. This will save you if you get caught out when day breaks. Wool of bat gives you bat swarm ability. when used you can summon bats that attack enemys you are looking at.
